PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-01662020-03-24ECCC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Declaring that the Provisions of the Regulations Respecting Reduction in the Release of Methane and Certain Volatile Organic Compounds (Upstream Oil and Gas Sector) Do Not Apply in British Columbia
PrecisORDER DECLARING THAT THE PROVISIONS OF THE REGULATIONS RESPECTING REDUCTION IN THE RELEASE OF METHANE AND CERTAIN VOLATILE ORGANIC COMPOUNDS (UPSTREAM OIL AND GAS SECTOR) DO NOT APPLY IN BRITISH COLUMBIA in order to reduce regulatory overlap and reporting burden, while allowing British Columbia to achieve equivalent methane emission reductions in the oil and gas sector in a manner that best suits its particular circumstances.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0060 Publication Date: 2020-04-15
AttachmentsAttachment
